mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.round_id FROM eval_response er JOIN eval_form ef ON er.form_id = ef.form_id JOIN eval_type et ON ef.type_id = et.type_id JOIN eval_round r ON er.round_id = r.round_id WHERE et.name = 'PEER' AND ef.name = 'HR_REVIEW' AND er.target_id = #{empId} AND ( r.year < #{year} OR (r.year = #{year} AND r.month <= #{month}) ) ORDER BY r.year DESC, r.month DESC LIMIT 2

SELECT er.score FROM eval_response er JOIN eval_form ef ON er.form_id = ef.form_id JOIN eval_type et ON ef.type_id = et.type_id WHERE et.name = 'PEER' AND ef.name = 'HR_REVIEW' AND er.round_id = #{roundId} AND er.target_id = #{empId} LIMIT 1

SELECT er.score FROM eval_response er JOIN eval_form ef ON er.form_id = ef.form_id JOIN eval_type et ON ef.type_id = et.type_id WHERE et.name = 'PEER' AND ef.name = 'HR_REVIEW' AND er.round_id = #{roundId}
SELECT rate_s AS rateS, rate_a AS rateA, rate_b AS rateB, rate_c AS rateC, rate_d AS rateD FROM eval_round WHERE round_id = #{roundId}
